class.name: Path3D
class.brief_description: Contains a [Curve3D] path for [PathFollow3D] nodes to follow.
class.description: Can have [PathFollow3D] child nodes moving along the [Curve3D]. See [PathFollow3D] for more information on the usage. Note that the path is considered as relative to the moved nodes (children of [PathFollow3D]). As such, the curve should usually start with a zero vector [code](0, 0, 0)[/code].
